application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 10 (landscaping and public realm scheme)  pursuant to planning permission reference 22/0075/VAROPDC dated 9/5/2022 for the variation of conditions 1, 2, 3, 4 and 11 of Reserved Matters Approval 21/0077/REMOPDC for full details of access, layout, scale, appearance and landscaping pursuant to outline planning permission reference 20/0037/FUMOPDC dated 7/9/2020 for a Class B8 Data Centre (data halls, plant rooms, below ground water storage tanks, temporary generators), administration building, sub-station, access, servicing, parking and landscaping. The proposed amendments comprise an increase in lift core heights; changes to plant/transformer gantries; reduction in roof plant screen height; changes to landscaping; changes to internal road layout; and a reduction in the screen height of the temporary generator compound.
